name: genkit-image
description: Comprehensive image processing for Genkit - generation, editing, analysis, optimization with Claude Vision, DALL-E, Stable Diffusion, and Sharp
author: Amit Patole

commands.name: genkit-image-generate
commands.description: Generate images using DALL-E, Stable Diffusion, or Midjourney

commands.name: genkit-image-analyze
commands.description: Analyze images with Claude Vision or GPT-4 Vision

commands.name: genkit-image-edit
commands.description: Edit images (resize, crop, filter, watermark, background removal)

commands.name: genkit-image-optimize
commands.description: Optimize images for web (compression, format conversion, responsive)

commands.name: genkit-image-ocr
commands.description: Extract text from images using OCR (Tesseract, Cloud Vision)

commands.name: genkit-image-caption
commands.description: Generate captions and alt text for accessibility

agents.name: image-expert
agents.description: Image processing and computer vision specialist
